headline: Why The Narrative Around Dave & Buster's Is Shifting After New Analyst Updates and Leadership Changes
summary: Dave & Buster's Entertainment stock has recently experienced a shift in sentiment among analysts, with the consensus price target moving down from $29.57 to $27.88. This adjustment reflects a more cautious outlook as analysts weigh the company's operational improvements against ongoing consumer and macroeconomic challenges. headline: Medtronic (MDT) Price Target Raised as PFA Technology Drives Q2 Revenue Gains
summary: Medtronic plc (NYSE:MDT) ranks among the best slow growth stocks to invest in.
